entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h before morning. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 06 January 2023
